page.title: 09Going to games on the Bus.
page.content: Our school has got a very small school field and so for our Middle School games lessons we go by bus to Weston Lane Playing Field which is about a mile away. The older children go together (about 70 children) on a Thursday afternoon for an hour and the younger children go on a Tuesday. We go on a{Double Decker bus}which waits for us by the school gate.The bus has got about 75 seats so there is plenty of room for us all.We go upstairs on the way to the field and downstairs on the way back.I like it up stairs best because you can see all around. We have to take all our own sports equipment with us and in our different groups we have a chance of learning all sorts of games-football,hockey, rugby,netball,rounders,tennis,cricket.
